ovdesc.p: This is an internal file providing a reference between each Customer and all Secure message belonging to him.
Only the S(ee),P(rint) and L(ist) functions may be used in this application.

desc.p: The ID of Customer Secure Message is the ID of the Customer specified the Secure Message record.
Specifies the secure message ids belonging to this Customer
The number of secure message ids of this Customer are held one per field
